content.rendered:
3D EVOLUTION FRONT REPLACEMENT WINCH BAR SUITABLE FOR THE TOYOTA HILUX 2012+ IS HERE!

The new and exciting 3D Evolution front replacement winch bar is available for order now. These new bars give your vehicle an aggressive 4wd look without looking like a truck. They are a tough 3 and 5mm all steel construction and protect all of your engine vitals. They also give you full winch compatibility, 2 rated recovery points, industry leading angle of approach, and a heavy duty bash plate.

-The 3D Evolution Bumper is finished in a hard-wearing slightly textured black Powder coat as standard and can be colour coded as an option. It is a 3mm and 5mm steel construction and includes as standard a 5mm Aluminium bash plate not offered on other brands. The middle winch plate insert comes standard in Black and can be optioned as stainless steel. We also offer as standard, LED fog lights which are an option on many other brands.

-The 3D Evolution bumper has carried out many dynamic crash tests here in Australia to ensure it complements the existing safety systems for example Air bags. The Standard bumper on your vehicle gets removed completely and can be saved / sold.

*Suits wide body Hilux, or narrow body with after market flares

Includes:

Standard with Winch mount

Integrated imported Fog lights

5mm Aluminium Bash / Protection plate

2 x Vehicle recovery points

Optional:

Can be colour coded to your vehicle specification

Middle winch plate insert can be optioned as stainless steel

Shackles

Winch

Spotlight bar

Spotlights

excerpt.rendered:
RHINO BAR SUIT HILUX 2012-2015

Please note: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order.
